text: Lipstick is a 1976 American crime drama thriller movie directed by Lamont Johnson and starring Margaux Hemingway, Mariel Hemingway, Chris Sarandon, Anne Bancroft, Perry King, John Bennett Perry, Meg Wylie. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1976 crime drama movies Category:1976 crime thriller movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Lamont Johnson
title: Lipstick (1976 movie)
